subject: VAM Pro power supply socket type
description_text:
Hello,

I want to buy a set of two Power motors (VAM Pro Linear Motor) and a
controller box. Looking at the images it looks like power supply is US
standard socket. I live in Europe and would need European socket type (type
c).

I did not find a way to choose a socket type when adding items to the cart
on your website.

Thank you,
Jasmin

conversations.body_text: 你好，Jasmin Begic，  默认情况下，我们会根据目的地国家/地区提供相应的插头类型——我们目前支持英国和欧盟标准。 如果您有特定偏好，请在订单中留言，我们将根据您的要求进行调整。

Thank you for your email,

I have another question, which control box should I buy for VAM Pro Linear
Motors, is it "plus x control box" or "pro x ultra pedal control box" ?

Thank you,
Jasmin

On Thu, Jul 10, 2025 at 5:34 AM service@simsonn.com
你好，Jasmin Begic，  我们建议选择 ProX Ultra 控制箱以获得最佳兼容性和性能。
